class.name: ColorPickerButton
class.description: Encapsulates a [ColorPicker] making it accessible by pressing a button. Pressing the button will toggle the [ColorPicker] visibility. See also [BaseButton] which contains common properties and methods associated with this node.

method.name: get_picker
method.description: Returns the [ColorPicker] that this node toggles.

method.name: get_popup
method.description: Returns the control's [PopupPanel] which allows you to connect to popup signals. This allows you to handle events when the ColorPicker is shown or hidden.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], the alpha channel in the displayed [ColorPicker] will be visible.

signal.name: picker_created
signal.description: Emitted when the [ColorPicker] is created (the button is pressed for the first time).

theme_items.theme_item: The background of the color preview rect on the button.
